short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost productivity with a Pomodoro timer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your productivity with our sleek Pomodoro Timer extension! 
Stay focused and energized throughout your workday with customizable work and rest intervals. Our timer features:
- Flexible work and break durations to suit your workflow
- Repeatable sequences for extended productivity sessions
- A floating timer window for easy visibility

Don't let distractions derail your day. Take control of your time and maximize your efficiency with our Productivity Timer. Install now and transform the way you work!
